name: FPSpooky
description:
This is the very first look at FPSpooky. I took inspiration from the PS game RE Survivor for the aiming system.

It's not really much of a game yet, but I think it can be fun for a couple of minutes. The objective for this demo is one: reach the final room and don't let the zombies kill you.

Controls:

>Left Mouse button: shoot

>Right Mouse button: reload

>F: Interact/Use item

>Q: Switch weapon

>Scrollwheel: Look up/down

Please be sure to give me any kind of feedback you have.

Update: updated the demo with a couple of fixes and tweaked the level layout a bit.
